name: Kidcat: A point and shoot microgame
name_original: Kidcat: A point and shoot microgame
description:
Kidcat was cursed when he was a baby. He can only interact with a gun. Anyway, his grandma (and all the village) try to treat him has a normal kid. 

In this microgame, you will help Kidcat to get some bread to his grandma.

CONTROLS:

Left and right arrows (or A and D) to move.

Up arrow (or W) to enter to shops
Left click to interact

NOTE:

We will keep developing this microgame a bit more. Soon, you will have to get some milk too! :)

######################################################

This is a game developed during LDJAM41

Bugs are to be expected.

######################################################
